divs: sighting detailson the morning of september 27th a we were parked outside the hopital we were building called pornuef medical center. as we were waiting for work to begin a 7a.m. we usually get to parking early around 620a.m. so it was still very dark in th e morning. from our position the hopital sits on top of a hill and you can see the town of pocatello and the mountains behind heading towards utah. being a navy veteran and a ufo enthusiast im always looking up at the sky for unidentified objects. on that morning i looked out to the mountains towards utah, as i was looking a white light suddenly appeared virtually out of nowhere. it came down, and settled on a flight pattern too low to be a satellite. as i observed this object i realized it had no navigation lights which are common among manmade flying objects as we all know. this was the first red flag that alerted me as this is a tell tale sign that what i was looking at might be a ufo. i looked over at my work partner and was telling him what i was seeing in the sky, he sleepy didnt even bother to look. as i kept watching this object i realized i had binoculars under the passenger seat as i had attended a college football game on sat in boise. i looked through the binos and at this time it had moved across the sky slowly flying toward idaho falls. it did not look like a plane as there is a small airport in pocatello and idaho falls which is what initially what i thought. upon gazing at this vehicle through the binos it looked like a ferris wheel with white lights around it. i could not see the center of it but did notice the lights. i became convinced it was a ufo and not a plane or helicopter, it had no nav lights on it what so ever. i was very excited about the sighting and told everyone i worked with and even drew a picture of it. everyone was skeptical about it and most made fun of me. since then ive been looking at pictures of ufo's and have not seen a ufo that fits this description. also the year before this sighting i was in shelby, montana visiting family around july the 11th at about 1030p.m. we were at a fair in shelby. when everyone left as it is a small town i was waiting for my brother inlaw and a friend to return to the vehicle because we were leaving. i noticed a couple walking to their vehicle and they were looking up at the sky, so i looked and seen a white light with no nav lights too low to be a satellite moving across the sky very slowly. i told my brother inlaw about it, the next day the local paper had an article in it about someone calling the sheriffs department reporting a ufo sighting and that this witness was very excited about it. i showed the article to my brother in law and i told him see i told you i seen something in the sky. im very exited about having 2 sightings in back to back years, i will keep looking up into the sky untill i see another. i did not have any photos of these sightings but am still very exited about it. we are not alone *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
Summary: Flying object that looked like a ferris wheel with lights around it where the seats would be like a ferris wheel.
